name: portfolio-monorepo-template
description: A comprehensive portfolio starter template built as a monorepo for junior developers
author: Shreyansh Awadhiya

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd apps/web && bun run dev" "cd apps/admin && bun run dev" "cd apps/server && bun run dev" --names "web,admin,server" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd apps/web && bun run start" "cd apps/admin && bun run start" "cd apps/server && bun run start" --names "web,admin,server" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow"
scripts.build: cd apps/web && bun run build && cd ../admin && bun run build
scripts.postinstall: echo 'âœ… Portfolio template ready! Run: bun run dev'
